TopicTitle: part config, locking a tank to be empty in VAB?

Articles.Content:
making a tank, holds kethane, everything works, VAB spawns it empty

but i can right click it in VAB, and fill the tank, which i dont like

so how to lock the tank at empty (so i can only fill it later after launch)
Don't right click and fill it.... it will stay empty.

It's definitely possible, but I forget whether it was defined in the part config or whether the resource itself has to be configured... I would check, but I'm at work.

I recommend you find a mod that already does this, and see if you can spot the required line in the configs.
If you've got the kethane mod have a look at the config files for the storage tanks. I'm pretty sure you can't fill them in the VAB.
